required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Acupressure on Recovery of Bowel Function in Patients Post Cesarean Section
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Acupressure on Recovery of Bowel Function in Patients Post Cesarean Section

brief_summary.textblock:
Research objectives To compare the efficacy of acupressure with no acupressure to examine time to first flatus in patient post cesarean section
; Acupressure at ST-36 Zusanli (lateral to anterior crest of tibia, in the tibialis anterior muscle)
Research hypothesis Patients who received acupressure will have earlier flatus passage

detailed_description.textblock: Research design Randomized controlled trial. Compare between The investigators is who assess the acupressure with control group is the participants do not assess the acupressure

primary_outcome.measure: To study the duration of the first time to flatus passage in post cesaren section patient
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: the duration ; hour after post cesaren section

secondary_outcome.measure: To study the duration of the first time to have bowel sound in post cesaren section patient
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: the duration ; hour after post cesaren section

secondary_outcome.measure: To study the duration of the first time to pass stool in post cesaren section patient
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: the duration ; hour after post cesaren section

secondary_outcome.measure: To study the symptomatic about Nausea/vomiting in post cesaren section patient

arm_group.description: Acupressure after cesarean section 3 hr and then next 3 hr (duration 10 min per time) Acupressure at below knee the point ai locate about4 finger spcae below patella on the lateral side of tibia bone

intervention.description: Acupressure after cesarean section 3 hr and then next 3 hr (duration 10 min per time)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Pregnancy woman age 18-45 years
2. General anesthesia
3. Co-operate in research
4. Can speak in thai language
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Twin pregnancy
2. Placenta previa
3. Placental abruption
4. Chorioamnionitis
5. Complication intraoperation (Bowel or bladder injury)
6. Post partum hemorrhage
7. Abdominal adhesion
8. Opertative time more than 2 hour
9. History gastrointestinal surgery
10. Prior acupressure
11. Neurological disease
12. Neuromuscular disease
13. Hepatic disease
